episodes.title: Netflix SIRENS: Why this "Cult" ISN'T what you think it is!
episodes.description:
🎬 Welcome to my mini-series, Psychology on Screen!

Netflix's "Sirens" had us all guessing – is it a cult? A murder mystery? But what if the real genius of the show lies in its masterful use of psychology?

Join us as we dive deep into the mind games, power dynamics, and subtle manipulations that make "Sirens" so captivating. We'll explore how the show exposes a modern form of "cult" built on structural and financial power, social capital, and the exploitation of vulnerability, rather than traditional brainwashing.

Discover why we're all falling for the lure of this unsettling series and what it truly reveals about human nature.
